alert.note: Alert for Central Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 8:52PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Tehama, west central Butte and northeastern Glenn Counties through 945 PM PDT... At 851 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Vina to near Orland to near Artois. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orland, Artois, Bluegum, Nord, Ordbend, Vina and Hamilton City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley
